text: merle_dixon You want to know the day ?

boy Mom ! -Right here lori and amy sort out mushrooms that they have collected .

carl_grimes Yes , mom .
dale_horvath You too . Do n't wander too far . Stay within shouting distance . And if you see anything , holler . I 'll come running .

lori_grimes Yes , mom She goes into the woods to pick some more food for the camp . Contents While she is in the woods , leaves rustle . Bird wings flap , branch snaps . She starts to think that someone is following her . She worries that it is one of the Walkers and starts to look around . Suddenly , a hand reaches around her mouth and she is dragged back .
shane_walsh Shh shh shh shh shh shh shh .
lori_grimes You scared the hell out of me lori laughs at him .
shane_walsh I bet . That 's what you get for keeping me waiting . I was trying to be quiet . Where you been ?
lori_grimes amy the Mushroom queen -- I had to wait for her to get back They start kissing .
shane_walsh How much time do we have ?

lori_grimes Enough The two are in the moment and proceed to make love . While undressing , they see lori still has Rick 's ring around her neck on a necklace . She takes it off and holds onto it in the grass while they proceed .
shane_walsh Come here .
lori_grimes Okay In Atlanta , rick is still sitting in the tank when the voice is heard on the radio again .
glenn_rhee Hey , are you alive in there ?
rick_grimes Hello ? Hello ?
glenn_rhee There you are . You had me wondering .
rick_grimes Where are you ? Outside ? Can you see me right now ?
glenn_rhee Yeah , I can see you . You 're surrounded by walkers . That 's the bad news .
rick_grimes There 's good news ?
glenn_rhee No .
rick_grimes Listen , whoever you are , I do n't mind telling you I 'm a little concerned in here .
glenn_rhee Oh man . You should see it from over here . You 'd be having a major freak - out .
rick_grimes Got any advice for me ?
glenn_rhee Yeah , I 'd say make a run for it .
rick_grimes That 's it ? """" Make a run for it """" ?

glenn_rhee My way 's not as dumb as it sounds . You 've got eyes on the outside here . There 's one geek still up on the tank but the others have climbed down and joined the feeding frenzy where the horse went down . With me so far ?
rick_grimes So far .
glenn_rhee Okay , the street on the other side of the tank is less crowded . If you move now while they 're distracted , you stand a chance . Got ammo ?
rick_grimes In that duffel bag I dropped out there , and guns . Can I get to it ?
glenn_rhee Forget the bag , okay ? It 's not an option . What do you have on you ?
rick_grimes Hang on rick has the Beretta 92FS that he took off of the Soldier , but it only has one clip .
rick_grimes Yeah . Yeah He also finds a grenade , but he clips it onto his belt and does n't tell the man about it .
rick_grimes I 've got a Beretta with one clip , 15 rounds .
glenn_rhee Make 'em count . Jump off the right side of the tank , keep going in that direction . There 's an alley up the street , maybe 50 yards . Be there .
rick_grimes Hey , what 's your name ?
glenn_rhee Have you been listening ? You 're running out of time .
rick_grimes Right rick makes his break after grabbing a metal shard in the tank . He opens the top and whacks the Walker on the tank with the metal shard , slicing its face wide open .
rick_grimes Ah ! He runs down the street , firing at any Walker in his way , killing 8 of them . He comes across the man whose been talking to him .
glenn_rhee Whoa ! Not dead ! Come on ! Come on ! Back here ! Come on ! Come on ! The two proceed to run down the alley and start climbing up a ladder .
glenn_rhee What are you doing ? ! Come on ! rick climbs up the ladder .
glenn_rhee Come on , get up Both pant .
glenn_rhee Nice moves there , Clint Eastwood . You the new sheriff come riding in to clean up the town ? glenn says that he hopes that rick would do the same for him one day .
rick_grimes It was n't my intention .
glenn_rhee Yeah , whatever . Yeehaw . You 're still a dumbass .
rick_grimes Rick . Thanks .
glenn_rhee Glenn . You 're welcome . Oh no . The bright .
side It 'll be the fall that kills us . I 'm a glass - half - full kind of guy The two climb up the ladder that leads to the top of a store that glenn is camping out at .
rick_grimes Are you the one that barricaded the alley ?
glenn_rhee Somebody did . I guess when the city got overrun . Whoever did it was thinking not many geeks would get through .
rick_grimes Back at the tank , why 'd you stick your neck out for me ?

glenn_rhee Call it foolish , naive hope that if I 'm ever that far up sh1 t creek , somebody might do the same for me . Guess I 'm an even bigger dumbass than you glenn takes another ladder and goes down , following by Rick . It leads to the building . glenn takes out a walkie - talkie .

glenn_rhee I 'm back . Got a guest plus four geeks in the alley The two go down another staircase to a door where two Walkers appear . Two men , morales and T - Dog , come out with protective gear and baseball bats . They each go after one of the Walkers and bash their brains in .
glenn_rhee Lets go ! rick and glenn make their way into the store .

theodore_douglas Morales , lets go ! t - dog and morales follow after they finish the Walkers . They get inside where two more survivors , jacqui and andrea are also taking cover . rick immediately has a gun pointed in his face by Andrea .
andrea_harrison You son of a bitch . We ought to kill you .
morales Just chill out , Andrea . Back off .
jacqui Come on , ease up .
andrea_harrison Ease up ? You 're kidding me , right ? We 're dead because of this stupid asshole .
morales Andrea , I said back the hell off . Well , pull the trigger .
andrea_harrison We 're dead -- all of us -- because of you .
rick_grimes I do n't understand .

morales Look , we came into the city to scavenge supplies . You know what the key to scavenging is ? Surviving ! You know the key to surviving ? Sneaking in and out , tiptoeing . Not shooting up the streets like it 's the O. K. Corral .
theodore_douglas Every geek for miles around heard you popping off rounds .
andrea_harrison You just rang the dinner bell .
morales Get the picture now ? They see the zombies growling and trying to get into the store . A few Walkers is attempting to smash through the double set of doors to get to them .
andrea_harrison Oh god . What the hell were you doing out there anyway ?
rick_grimes Trying to flag the helicopter .
theodore_douglas Helicopter ? Man , that 's crap . Ai n't no damn helicopter .
jacqui You were chasing a hallucination , imaging things it happens .
rick_grimes I saw it .
morales Hey , T - Dog , try that CB . Can you contact the others ?
rick_grimes Others ? The refugee center ?
jacqui Yeah , the refugee center . They 've got biscuits waiting at the oven for us t - dog tries to get in contact with some other survivors but get no signal .
theodore_douglas Got no signal . Maybe the roof Above , on the roof , they hear a gun firing .
andrea_harrison Oh no . Is that Dixon ?
morales What is that maniac doing ?
glenn_rhee Come on , let 's go The group runs up to the roof . merle Dixon is shooting at several of the Walkers on the street below with a sniper rifle , killing some of them .
morales Hey , Dixon , are you crazy ? ! Dixon laughs and continues shooting .
andrea_harrison Oh jeez .
merle_dixon Hey ! Y'all be more polite to a man with a gun ! Huh ? Ah ! Only common sense .
theodore_douglas Man , you wasting bullets we ai n't even got ! merle continues laughing .
theodore_douglas And you 're bringing even more of them down on our ass ! Man , just chill .
merle_dixon Hey ! Bad enough I 've got this taco - bender on my ass all day . Now I 'm gon na take orders from you ? I do n't think so , bro . That 'll be the day .
"theodore_douglas """ That 'll be the day """" ? You got something you want to tell me ?
morales Hey , t - dog man , just leave it .
theodore_douglas No .
morales All right ? It ai n't worth it . Now Merle , just relax , okay ? We 've got enough trouble .
merle_dixon I 'll tell you the day , Mr. """" Yo . """" It 's the day I take orders from a nigger .
theodore_douglas Mother-- merle and t - dog start to fight .
morales Hey , come on , Merle . That 's enough .
andrea_harrison Come on . Dixon !
morales Whoa , cut it out , man !
andrea_harrison Stop it ! Dixon , get off him ! Dixon , you 're gon na hurt him .
morales Merle , cut it out ! merle is beating t - dog to a pulp and then holds a pistol on him .
andrea_harrison No no no , please . Please Everybody waits to see what Dixon is gon na do .
merle_dixon Yeah ! All right ! We 're gon na have ourselves a little powwow , huh ? Talk about who 's in charge . I vote me . Anybody else ? Huh ? Democracy time , y' all . Show of hands , huh ?
andrea_harrison Come on .
merle_dixon All in favor ? Huh ? Let 's see 'em . Oh , come on . All in favor ? Yeah . That 's good . Now that means I 'm the boss , right ? Yeah . Anybody else ? Hmm ? Anybody ?
rick_grimes Yeah At this time , rick hits merle over the head with a pipe . He proceeds to handcuff merle to a pipe .
merle_dixon Who the hell are you , man ? !

rick_grimes Officer friendly . Look here , Merle . Things are different now . There are no niggers anymore . No dumb - as - shit , inbred white - trash fools either . Only dark meat and white meat . There 's us and the dead . We survive this by pulling together , not apart .
merle_dixon Screw you , man .
rick_grimes I can see you make a habit of missing the point .
merle_dixon Yeah ? Well , screw you twice .
rick_grimes Ought to be polite to a with a gun rick cocks his gun .
rick_grimes Only common sense .
merle_dixon You would n't . You 're a cop .
rick_grimes All I am anymore is a man looking for his wife and son . Anybody that gets in the way of that is gon na lose . I 'll give you a moment to think about that . Got some on your nose there .
merle_dixon What are you gon na do ? Arrest me ? Dixon laughs .
merle_dixon Hey ! What are you doing ? Man , that was my stuff ! Hey ! If I get loose , you 'd better pray . Yeah , you hear me , you pig ? ! You hear me ? !
rick_grimes Yeah , your voice carries .
merle_dixon Do you hear me , you filthy pig ? !
morales You 're not Atlanta P. D. Where you from ?
rick_grimes Up the road a ways .
morales Well , officer friendly from up the road a ways , welcome to the big city Later , they 're still watching the Walkers in the street .
andrea_harrison God , it 's like times square down there .
morales How 's that signal ?
theodore_douglas Like Dixon 's brain -- weak .
morales Keep trying .
andrea_harrison Why ? There 's nothing they can do . Not a damn thing .
morales Got some people outside the city is all . There 's no refugee center . That 's a pipe dream .
rick_grimes Then she 's right . We 're on our own . It 's up to us to find a way out .

merle_dixon Good luck with that . These streets ai n't safe in this part of town from what I hear . Ai n't that right , sugar tits ? Hey , honeybunch , what say you get me out of these cuffs , we go off somewhere and bump some uglies ? Gon na die anyway .
andrea_harrison I 'd rather .
merle_dixon Rug muncher . I figured as much .
morales The streets are n't safe . Now there 's an understatement .
rick_grimes What about under the streets ? The sewers ?
morales Oh man . Hey , Glenn , check the alley . You see any manhole covers ? glenn checks but sees only some Walkers .
glenn_rhee No , must be all out on the street where the geeks are .
jacqui Maybe not . Old building like this built in the ' 20s . Big structures often had drainage tunnels into the sewers in case of flooding down in the subbasements .
glenn_rhee How do you know that ?
jacqui It 's my job . was . I worked in the city zoning office The group heads down to the basement and reach a sewer entrance .
morales This is it ? Are you sure ?

glenn_rhee I really scoped this place out the other times I was here . It 's the only thing in the building that goes down . But I 've never gone down it . Who 'd want to , right ? Everybody look at him .
glenn_rhee Oh . Great .
andrea_harrison We 'll be right behind you .
glenn_rhee No , you wo n't . Not you .
andrea_harrison Why not me ? Think I ca n't ?
glenn_rhee I wasn't-- .
rick_grimes Speak your mind .
andrea_harrison They smell dead , we do n't . It 's pretty distinct rick gives outfits and accessories to the others .
glenn_rhee If bad ideas were an Olympic event , this would take the gold .
morales He 's right . Just stop , okay ? Take some time to think this through .

glenn_rhee Look , until now I always came here by myself . In and out , grab a few things . No problem . The first time I bring a group . Everything goes to hell . No offense . If you want me to go down this gnarly hole , fine . But only if we do it my way . It 's tight down there . If I run into something and have to get out quick , I do n't want you all jammed up behind me getting me killed . I 'll take one person . Not you either . You 've got Merle 's gun and I 've seen you shoot . I 'd feel better if you were out in that store watching those doors , covering our ass . And you 've got the only other gun , so you should go with him . You be my wingman . jacqui stays here . Something happens , yell down to us , get us back up here in a hurry .
jacqui Okay .
rick_grimes Okay , everybody knows their jobs glenn leads down the ladder , followed by Morales . The others leave . glenn and morales walk . A rat squeals and glenn makes a noise .

andrea_harrison Not that it was entirely unjustified . You did get us into this .

andrea_harrison No , but It 'd be a start .
rick_grimes Next time though , take the safety off . It wo n't shoot otherwise .

rick_grimes You may have occasion to use it .
andrea_harrison Good to know .

merle_dixon Yeah , well , that makes two of us . Why do n't you knock that crap off ? You 're giving me a headache , boy .
theodore_douglas Why do n't you pull your head out of your ass ? Maybe your headache will go away merle chuckles .
theodore_douglas Try some positivity for a change . Damn .

merle_dixon I 'll tell you what . You get me out of these cuffs and I 'll be all """" Sammy Sunshine """" positive for you . Hey , see that hacksaw over there in that toolbag ? Get it for me , hmm ? Make it worth your while . What do you say , man ? Come on . Get me out of these things .
theodore_douglas So you can beat my ass again ? Or call me nigger some more ?

merle_dixon Come on now . It was n't personal . It 's just that your kind and my kind ai n't meant to mix . That 's all . It does n't mean we ca n't . Work together , parley , as long as there 's some kind of mutual gain involved . So . about that hacksaw .
theodore_douglas I guess you want me to get that rifle over there too so you can shoot that cop when he comes back up , huh ?
merle_dixon Huh In the sewers , glenn and morales continue to look for a way out through the sewers . They reach a grate and wonder if they can break through .
morales Yeah , we 've got ourselves . A sewer tunnel . jacqui was right .
glenn_rhee Can we cut through it ?
morales If we had a blowtorch and half a day , sure . Dale 's hacksaw sure as hell wo n't do it A Walker appears at the grate eating a rat . glenn and jump back as the Walker tries to grab at them .
andrea_harrison Oh rick spots andrea looking at some jewelry . He approaches her .
rick_grimes See something you like ? andrea looks at a mermaid necklace on the counter .

andrea_harrison Not me , but I know someone who would . My sister . She 's still such a kid in some ways . Unicorns , dragons . She 's into all that stuff . But mermaids . They rule . She loves mermaids .
rick_grimes Why not take it ?
andrea_harrison There 's a cop staring at me rick chuckles .

morales Not a way out .
andrea_harrison We need to find a way . and soon rick spots a truck at a construction site that is close to their location .
rick_grimes That construction site , those trucks . They always keep keys on hand .
morales You 'll never make it past the walkers .

glenn_rhee Yeah , but they were feeding . They were distracted .

jacqui God . Give it a rest .

glenn_rhee Right , like dogs . They hear a sound , they come .
rick_grimes What else ?
morales Aside from they hear you ? They see you , smell you and if they catch you , they eat you .
rick_grimes They can tell us by smell ?
glenn_rhee Ca n't you ?

rick_grimes How much time ? They already got through one set of doors , that glass wo n't hold forever The group goes outside and drags one of the Walkers they killed into the store . rick grabs a fire axe and the group puts on trench coats so they do n't get guts on their good clothes . rick is prepared to start chopping , but he stops at the last moment . He gets down and searches the Walker . He pulls out a wallet .

rick_grimes Wayne Dunlap . Georgia license . Born in 1979 . He had $ 28 in his pocket when he died . And a picture of a pretty girl . """" With love , from Rachel . """" He used to be like us . Worrying about bills or the rent or the Super Bowl . If I ever find my family , I 'm gon na tell them about Wayne .

The Walkers briefly look at them , but the Walkers smell dead on them so they do n't bother . rick and glenn crawl under a bus and come out on the other side where a huge hoard of Walkers is waiting for them . rick and glenn continue to shuffle through the crowd without any Walkers noticing that they are alive . morales Oh man . It 's just a cloudburst . We get 'em all the time . It 'll pass real quick rick and glenn try not to panic as they continue to walk at the normal pace . They notice that the rain is starting to wash of the guts . The Walkers are starting to get a whiff of life walking past them and they start to get a little more aggressive towards rick and glenn as they try to figure out if they are dead or alive .
glenn_rhee The smell 's washing off . Is n't it ? Is it washing off ?

morales Come on , come on , come on The two throw their weapons over the fence and climb over it before the Walkers are able to get them . While glenn finds the keys to the truck , rick pulls Merle 's pistol and kills more Walkers with it . glenn finally finds the keys to the truck and throws them to Rick .

morales I 'm coming ! We 've got ta go ! leaves the roof , while t - dog is hesitating .

merle_dixon Morales ! You ca n't leave me like this , man ! Hey , T - Dog . No , man . You ca n't leave me , man . You ca n't leave me here . Not like this . You ca n't , man . It 's not human . Come on , do n't do this t - dog groans , but decides to free Dixon .

merle_dixon Come on , T. Come on ! Come on , yeah ! Yeah ! Come on ! Co. That 's it ! Yes ! Come on , baby ! Come on However , when he runs back towards Merle , he trips . The handcuff key falls out of his hand and ends up dropping down a drain . Zombies bangs as andrea and morales past by .
